page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The employment of people in our vicinty consists of many different jobs. In our area there are many shops and public houses; there are a couple of newsagents, two schools, which obviously provide many teaching jobs, and a post office and several banks. Building Societies are also quite familiar in Liphook and we have a large one near the school. In our twelve blocks there are two farms and two public houses. The two farms are that of crop rowing and milking cows.The land is not really rocky or steep or rough grazing like the type of land that sheep are kept so the farmland should provide many jobs and be a big provider for jobs. There are also army camps and these provide many jobs in the armed forces and combat camps.
